title: Chicken tikka masala
description: A quintessential British favourite and one that shouldn't rely on a phone call to the takeaway. Chicken tikka masala - we love you.
ingredients: 3 tbsp vegetable oil or ghee (clarified butter)
3cm/1¼in piece of fresh ginger, peeled and grated
½-1 tsp cayenne pepper (depending on how hot you like it)
